content.rendered:
Dear Diary,

Morning came too early. Bunnies were out. Squirrels came out later. There was a grey crown night heron near the hospital: just visiting, probably.

It took me about half an hour to make it to the store. When I was close, I heard some homeless guy saying something that doesn’t need to be repeated. Ever.

I decided to take my own advice and picked up a planner, mainly for the purpose of menu planning. It goes from April 2024 though the end of 2025. The other day, I was cleaning up and threw away a 2023 planner that went unused, so I hope that this one actually gets used for what it is intended for.

I got more Play-Doh, because I like it. It’s so much fun to squish and make things with. Unlike Lego, it just has one piece. It seems to just come in four colors.

Yesterday, I joined a local gym. I need to decide when I should go and actually exercise instead of just asking about the membership. This morning, I walked about a mile and a half, then I took the bus back. That counts for something.

I bought another song for my collection: Josh Baldwin’s “Made For More.” I heard it on the radio and decided to buy it. It seems that I got the live version. I like it.

It’s supposed to rain tomorrow. Maybe the rain will bring cooler temperatures.

Now might be a good time to go to the library. Maybe not, I need to go somewhere, in the opposite direction in about half an hour. I thought I was arriving on time last week and it turned out that I was a week early. Who knew. I didn’t.
